1.content:
Oliver walked towards his apartment. Another day, another dollar. Too bad he didn't get paid a whole heck of a lot, but he supposed it was enough to at least put a roof over his head. Walking up to his apartment he was surprised to find something curious just outside the building. One was a strange looking car, the other was a man standing in front of what looked like a Police Box. As he walked by the stranger spoke.

"Would you like a Jelly baby?"

"What?"

"A Jelly baby," the stranger held up an open bag. Oliver's Mom always warned him about taking stuff from strangers, but there was something about the man. Shrugging he took one from the Bag.

"They're really good aren't they?" the man mused."Great for increasing energy and health. Why don't you take the whole bag? I can always get more."

"Thank you. Who are you, if you don't mind me asking."

"I'm The Doctor."

"Doctor Who?"

"Correct."

Without saying another word the stranger with the scarf stepped into the Police Box. Shrugging Oliver walked up the steps of his apartment and was inside before he could notice the Police Box disappear. Stepping into his apartment he checked his phone messages, ate and checked his email.


Meanwhile in another Reality, on another dimensional plane, on the planet Mobius, Miles "Tails" Power was busy finishing his latest invention. It was finally ready. After countless hours of research, development, and hard work the Matter Transmitter was completed. Tails looked at his invention with satisfaction.

"Everything should be hooked up; the generator is at full power, the capacitor is charged, the coordinates are-"

"Tails..."

"Sonic!"Snapped Sally.

"Sorry, but come on! Let's do this already! I wanna see if you managed to make something faster than me!"

"It's been in the making for 4 months now;" said Sally "I think we can wait another minute."

" We can't rush this;" Explained Tails "We need to make sure everything is right! Who knows what can go wrong?"

"That's why you have me."

The Voice had come from NICOLE, Sally's personal handheld Computer, which Sally held upright toward a bank of computers."I'll be overseeing the progress as it executes; I'll be able to detect any faults and immediately stop it."

"Well; everything looks ready on my end;" Tails Finally said. "Sally, why don't you go ahead and connect NICOLE to the console over there."

Sally walked over a work table. Setting NICOLE down, she plugged in a cable, the other end of it plugged into the computer banks." How does it look?"

The little computer was silent for a moment." All systems operational; awaiting start."

"That's my queue." said Tails.

****

The first thing Oliver felt was a sudden tingling sensation all over his body as though he were touching a static ball. Then came a high pitch sound that seemed to be coming from nowhere and everywhere.

"What's Hap--"

Before he could finish, Oliver watched in awe his apartment disappeared around him. He found himself in darkness, partials of energy swirled all round him. .

*Where while Oliver re-appear?*
1.title: The Adventure Begins

choices: Teliportation failed Oliver appears to have vanished.
11.content:
"What's Happening?" asked Sally looking over Tail's shoulder.

"It's Impossible." said Tails astonished, "Something is in the matter stream."

"What do you mean "Something"?" Demanded Sonic.

"I mean something suddenly materialized inside the Teleportation beam. It wasn't there a second ago. I'm getting more data now...It's a life form."

"Can you send it back where it came from?"

"Sally, I don't even know yet where it came from. One thing's for sure If I have to bring in whatever it is in or it's pattern will degrade and it'll die."

"Maybe we should let it die."

Sally looked over at Sonic, not quite believing what she heard "Sonic, we can just Kill whatever it is!"

"It could be a threat bigger than Egg Man."

"Then again it might not. I'm willing to take the risk. Tails, bring it in."

Tails worked the consol sending commands to the Teleporter. Tails hadn't counted on materializing anyone in this phase of testing. The pattern caught in the matter stream was immediately sent through the pattern buffer. It was an incredibly slow process. He estimated the atomized life form would be in the pattern buffer a full sixty seconds before the rematerilization process began. Something he hoped to speed up as he made improvements to the unit. The Teleportation pad began to glow finally and a swirl of energy began to take shape. It was small, Very small, and shaped like an overlander (the comic name for Human). A moment past and the shape began to solidify and they could make out his clothing, and skin texture.

But it can't be...." But no doubt it certainly was there was no doubting the blue spiky hair and body and red super fast sneakers he was surrounded by a few other animal characters Oliver recognized Tails,the two-tailed fox Sonic's best friend and kid brother so to speak but the others...there was a purple walrus with a green baseball cap and a weird fox like thing in some type of palace guard's uniform looking smug,a squirrel with bright red hair in a blue vest and a girl rabbit whose legs and lower body was covered in parts of a metallic form "Tails I have no trouble recognizing but who are these other guys?" Oliver thought wildly as he was only familiar with the video games characters like Amy Rose,Knuckles and Cream the Rabbit he knew instantly but these people he didn't know who any of them were and so he took a closer look at his enormous surroundings everything looked primitive yet there was a computer in the far right corner of the room as he stood there pondering this the door at the left right suddenly opened up and the squirrel with the red hair and blue vest came walking in but fortunately she was too busy looking at a palm hand computer and speaking into it to take any notice of the tiny person on her table a few feet away "Nicole please is the process ready yet?' As she took a seat in a wooden chair just a mere two feet from where Oliver was trying to hide behind the giant flower pot NICOLE was uttering a response in a female HAL computerized voice he couldn't quite make out but it didn't matter as long as he stayed hidden he thought "She won't be able to see me I'll just have to wait until she falls asleep or something...." But it seemed this squirrel girl whom Oliver soon learned was named Princess Sally Acorn was either stuck to her seat or else she was too engrossed in whatever she was doing with her handheld computer thing NICOLE she sat there for hours on end not even moving typing away or speaking into the device and Oliver's right foot began to fall asleep he couldn't stand it "Darn it doesn't this squirrel ever sleep or do anything else?" He needed to move now as his foot was killing him so taking a dare he slowly began to inch away from the pot while keeping a watchful eye on the giant Sally in front of him in case her blue eyes darted towards him inch by inch he made his way from the flower pot until he was sure he could make a run for it behind the picture frame at least until he could plan his next move as Sally put up her computer and announced to herself how tired she was as she sought to get up and head to bed

14.content:
Feeling disoriented, Oliver landed face first into a damp and springy surface. It also had a familiar oder about it. He shivered uncontrollably as he rose to his feet. It took a moment for his eyes to focus right but when they did, he was shocked by what he saw.

It was perfectly clear to him that the structure he found himself in resembled the inside of a giant shoe or sneaker. No question about it. it was the way he was seeing it that had him in awe. Everything with the exception of the floor was made of fabric that looked to be woven out of one inch thick nylon rope. The floor looked to be made of foam padding and it wasn't even. There were huge indentations in the floor, as something heavy with a round-ish surface had been pressed into it. And inside the indentations the color of the material was darker, almost blackened. Exactly as though it had been made bay a Giant foot.

Oliver had just come to that conclusion when he felt the ground shake. But the tremors that shook the ground and were growing stronger in intensity were not random. They were in a pattern, exactly like the pattern of footsteps. The fact they they were growing stronger in intensity told him someone or something was coming, the question was, who?

15.title: Other Choices

151.content:
Overcome by a wave of vertigo and nausea, Oliver went on his hands and knees and promptly threw up.

He dry heaved for a few moments his eyes closed tightly as he tried to make the spinning sensation go away. There was a cool breeze and the smell of damp soil in the air. When he felt his strength return he opened his eyes to total darkness. Was he blind? No, he was certain he wasn't. Fumbling for his keys he turned on the little LED Light he had on his Key chain.

The white light illuminated a tunnel that was clearly not made by man. One end of the tunnel ended in blackness as did the other. The smartest thing he'd been taught was to stay in one spot when lost, but anyplace would be preferable to where he was now. Thoughts of the Movie Tremors came to mind, and he didn't want to meet up with any Graboids. Stepping over his Vomit Oliver walked forward, his body wracked with shivers from whatever the hell had happened to him. How the hell did he get here anyway? And where the Hell was here? He stumbled down the length of the tunnel, it seemed to go on forever. At one point he was walking down and then he was looking up, then he was walking right and then left. He fought back the feeling of claustrophobia and the fear that he may never get out of the tunnel, that his little light would suddenly die and he'd be trapped in the disorienting Blackness.

Finally, to his relief, he walked out into a large empty chamber. There was a source of light coming from above. The ceiling of the Chamber looked to be made, to Oliver's astonishment, Enormous Wooden Planks.

'I gotta get up there' he thought to himself.

Looking about the Chamber he saw that it was a crater of sorts and he was at the bottom of it. The lip of the crater reached up to a crack between two planks. Not wanting to stay in that spot any longer than need be, Oliver climbed upwards. Jumping up to grab the edge of the plank he lifted himself up into the world above. And what a world he was. As unbelievable as the situation already was, he found himself in an enormous---
151.title: A dark damp tunnel

info.brief_description: You are suddenly brought into A Macro Version of the Sonic Universe.
info.description:
The main Character in this interactive is a guy named Oliver, though His age depends on you. He lives a boring life in a single room apartment a and deals with the normalcy of everyday life. That is until he's transported into a Gigantic version of the Sonic Universe. What happens to him and who he encounters is entirely up to you. But first some ground rules, there's not many.

1) Oliver is around an inch tall compared to the Sonic Characters though depending on the Character he could look much smaller (Example if he met up with Dulcy the Dragon).

2)All sorts of situations is allowed with the exceptions of Pee and crap. Be creative and have fun with it.

3)This Universe is loosely based off the SATAM TV show but doesn't have to follow any guidelines, anything can happen and any sonic character can show up.

4) Chapters have to be at least a paragraph. "Oliver get's squished the end" isn't really interesting. But what size of the paragraph is up to you.

That's about all I can think of at the moment. If any of you have any questions feel free to let me know.
